scripts.dev: npm run asbuild:untouched && npm test && echo TODO: watch mode
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:untouched && npm run asbuild:optimized
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m 'v%s' && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m 'v%s' && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m 'v%s' && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
